Assassins.description:
(2) Assassins gain +15% @Crit chance 
 (4) On @Crit apply @Poison 
 (6) @Poison tick applies @Vulnerability

Archers.description:
(3) @Scathe: 30% to @Bonus Shot 
 (6) @Bonus Shot 15% to trigger another @Bonus Shot

PlagueSpreaders.description:
(2) @Plague heals allies for 0.5 after dealing damage to them 
 (4) @Skeletons gain @Scathe: apply @Plague 
 (6) @Skeletons gain +100% @base_damage, @move_speed and @max_hp

Freezers.description:
(2) @Frozen enemies have @Vulnerability 
 (4) @Injured: apply @Frozen to enemies in small area 
 (6) On @Frozen apply @Stun for 3 sec.
